name: KillerPunkte
description:
KillerPunkte is the Video Game version of a pen and paper game i came up with as a kid in school.

The game is ment to be played on one device, the players take turns moving their Pawns across a Map , getting into line of sight with an enemy pawn (linear or diagonal to the tiles of the map, so 8 directions) kills the moving pawn. Attempt to outsmart your oponnent by forcing them to run their pawns into inevitable doom.

The game is pretty simplistic as of know and holds little actuall game value, more as an exercise to me and fullfiling a dream of young me. 

I hope anyone can find some fun in this Project, i will add some more content to the game and will add a proper Gameplayloop to it.
